0: When I told the hotel staff that my belongings were stolen from my valeted car at JW Mariot Marquis Miami hotel at 25 Biscayne Boulevard Way in Miami the hotel staff at Sheraton Clayton Plaza waived my parking fee although it was not their fault
The room was prepared when I checked in but the staff at the front desk was really nice and helpful
The young lady at the front desk was a jewel
The front desk person was nice
The service at the front desk was warm and friendly
I highly recommend the shuttle service the drivers were very friendly and had knowledge of the city
Michele at the front desk was so friendly and helpful always with a smile
Courteous genuinely friendly staff people with local knowledge to share
1: We did not have any shampoo in the room so called down to the front desk and asked for some never came
Slight mix up with the room resulted in free breakfast and excellent service all round
Despite my travel coordinator ’s best efforts on arrival mid day I was informed by the front desk that my room would be ready in a few hours
The front desk people were short not friendly and looked very stressed out
Lazy staff make for horrible business stays
This property needs a total overhaul including the front desk staff
Add in the lack of shuttle service to the airport and there is simply no reason to stay at this overpriced hotel
Not the kind of service one expects at Sheraton
If you have a hotspot with Verizon you will find that it works better but service is poor within the hotel so the experience is not a whole lot better
